Title: Angela Merkel
Sentence: name "Germany's future interior minister Horst Seehofer vows to increase deportations"> news title Germany's future interior minister Horst Seehofer vows to increase deportations url March 2018 publisher Deusche Welle date 11 March 2018 archive date 16 March 2018 archive url Under Seehofer's plan
column4: Germany would reject migrants who have already been deported or have an entry ban and would instruct police to turn away all migrants who have registered elsewhere in EU
column5: no matter if these countries agreed to take them back.

column4: in a paper published by Social Science Research Network in New York has contended that a re analysis of Merkel hypothesis about distribution of global social expenditure based on 169 countries for which we have recent ILO Social Protection data and World Bank Gross national income GNI data in Purchasing power real purchasing power reveals that 27 EU countries with complete data spend only 33% of global world social protection expenditures
column5: while 13 non EU OECD members
column6: among them major other Western democracies
column7: spend 40% of global social protection expenditures
column8: BRICS 18% and Rest of World 9% of global social protection expenditures.

Title: Angela Merkel
Sentence: > news  Peel  Quentin  url  title Merkel warns on cost of welfare  work Financial Times  date 16 December 2012  access date 24 February 2016  archive date 24 March 2016  archive url  url status live  >efn The economist Arno Tausch from Corvinus University in Budapest
column4: in a paper published by Social Science Research Network in New York has contended that a re analysis of Merkel hypothesis about distribution of global social expenditure based on 169 countries for which we have recent ILO Social Protection data and World Bank Gross national income GNI data in Purchasing power real purchasing power reveals that 27 EU countries with complete data spend only 33% of global world social protection expenditures
column5: while 13 non EU OECD members
column6: among them major other Western democracies
column7: spend 40% of global social protection expenditures
column8: BRICS 18% and Rest of World 9% of global social protection expenditures.
